messages.msgSnippet: I had the pleasure of meeting Myla kabat-Zimm last week. She is truly wonderful! Amy ... From: tiffany thiele  To:
messages.messageBody:
I had the pleasure of meeting Myla kabat-Zimm last week. She is truly
wonderful!
Amy
----- Original Message -----
From: tiffany thiele <sthiele1@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 7:28 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Books


> I agree, Mindful Parenting is a great book. It is onne that I love having
> on my parenting bookshelf where I can re-read chapters. It has some great
> chapters on teens...I look forward to reading it again as I approach that
> age with my son.
> Tiffany
> Olympia, Washington
